text: Hagi vene'nemo'za zamu'enea hu'za mofavrea kasenezamataza za me'nefi zmantahigenka ko? Hagi nahige'za a'nemo'za mofavre ante'naku nehazageno, zamata negrige'za zamarimpare zamazama refita zanknara hu'za venenemo'za zamarimparera zamazana refinetaze? Hagi nahigeno zamavugosamo'a, kore nehaza vahe'mofo zamavugosamo'ma nehiazana nehie?
